name: Last Rites (itch) (Netherpetal)
description:
Last Rites is a 2D hand-drawn fighting game set in a dark fantasy world overrun with monsters. You play as one of 3 characters; The Gravedigger, The Vampire, and The Knight, all with unique movesets and playstyles. The characters each have their own home-field 3D environments, music tracks and color palettes. 

Play against friends at the computer or on the couch in Versus Mode!

Go solo and battle your way through the Story Mode and Arcade Mode!  

Improve your skill and learn new combos in Training Mode!

The game comes complete with controller and keyboard support, as well as button remapping.

Last Rites was made in 9 months by Media Design School Game Art Bachelor students. The team was:
Francis Jones        Art Lead, Character Designer, UI Designer
James Bennett      2D Generalist, Animator
Dennis Lin            Animator, VFX Designer
Mitch Janes          3D Modeller, Texture Artist, Sound Designer
Ethan Hoppe        Tools, Systems, and Gameplay Programmer
Jacob Dewse        AI, Story, and Systems Programmer

Special thanks to Brandon Van Kan and Josh Tuitahi.

Hope you enjoy!
